overall very good game, but sad when you haft to sacrifice your companion cube.

Uno de los juegos insignia de Valve, este deleitará a los amantes de los shooters y los puzzles, mezclando ambos conceptos. Todo es excelente, pese a que cojea un poco gráficamente (debido a lo antiguo que es el juego). La música es excelente, la trama no es de otro mundo, pero tiene muy buenas partes, además, la villana es una de las mejores y más carismáticas que he visto en mucho tiempo. 

NOTA FINAL: The cake is a lie/10

회색 타일로 뒤덮혀 있고 자꾸 이상한 븽븽븽븽 이런 소리나서 그런지 괜히 등골 오싹해짐.
자꾸 나오는 여자목소리도 기괴함.
근데 확실히 재밌고 퍼즐을 풀어서 등골이 오싹한건지 무서워서 오싹한건지 모르겠음.
그리고 멀미 존나 남 백신맞고 겜하는데 이게 백신땜에 그런건지 포탈땜에 그런건지

I would definitely recommend this game to everyone who is willing to play a puzzle game. It is fun and fairly challenging, but not too hard. I can't really say anything about the graphics since I had to play on low since I have a very low-end pc, but they still looked good and ran excellent. It is also quite cheap when it is on sale and I love the atmosphere the game gives off. The underground lab is just so cool to me.
very good

A truly classic game, and one i have personally come back to multiple times (on multiple platforms as well). Can be completed in less then two hours, if you know what you're doing. The wonderful puzzle design, eerie atmosphere, and fun portal gun more than make up for the length though.

its a good game, i like sticking myself in infinite portal loops
Cool game. I played it before so I could go through the main game pretty fast but there's mods that add new sets of test chambers which is cool

a game that makes you think without boring you to death.

I'm late to the party on this one, but this game is clever. This puzzle game play loop is so addicting, I couldn't stop...so I didn't. Finished it in a day. Just challenging enough to be rewarding but not too difficult to get you frustrated to just want to turn it off.
Good game, very short though.

After coming back after years, the only flaw is how short the game is! If you get a few hours and have never played this game before this is a must play. You can beat in in under 11 hours without looking up too much, and you have fun doing it. This game is cheap and does go on sell quite a lot so pick it up when you can.
Impossible to dislike as long as you play this game before Portal 2; otherwise, the game might feel lacking.

GOOD GAME, IT MADE ME SHORT BUT VERY ENTERTAINING AND INTERESTING. NOW I'LL PLAY THE SECOND PART.

A pesar del tiempo que ha pasado desde que salio este juego sigue siendo una obra de arte, entreteniendo de la misma manera desde que lo probé la primera vez, una historia no muy relevante en el primer juego pero se compensa bastante en el segundo.
Es un juego con una mecánica simple y en cierto modo fácil de dominar pero cada vez dándote desafíos mas difíciles.
Es corto y se puede pasar entre 2 a 4 horas aproximadamente si lo juegas por primera vez, ya que te estrujara un poco el cerebro encontrarte con este tipo de puzzles por primera vez siendo una necesidad indispensable el desplazamiento de tu personaje y objetos entre portales.
Básicamente, es un juego que no dura tanto, y que no te adentras mucho en la historia (en esta entrega); a pesar de esto es uno de los mejores juegos que yo y muchos han probado, y es completamente recomendado adquirirlo (aunque recomiendo esperar un poco a los descuentos), y cuando los atrape el arte de los portales les animo a conseguir la segunda entrega (pueden comprar los 2 juegos a un menor precio en un paquete hecho por Valve).

Este jogo é o melhor jogo da história.
simplesmente perfeito.
incrível.
very good ,very fun

Anyone who likes video games, this is one of those games everyone should play at least once at one point in their lives, especially if they like puzzles and sci-fi.  Buy this when it goes on sale, I'd recommend buying it in the bundle with Portal 2. 
 They're both good and you save extra money.

Portal 1 is a good, tight, basic puzzle game revolving around portals.  While Portal 2 is like a puzzle game inside of a story, Portal 1 is like a story inside of a puzzle game if that makes sense.  Portal 1 you can kind of play whatever levels you want and mostly forget about the story (not that Portal 2 is bad it's fantastic too).  No boring tutorials although you'll learn along the way and pick things up fairly easily.  Just get in there you'll have fun.
Lil short but fun the whole way.
Woo. Go through the portal of magic.
